I love this phone the camera is perfect I haven't even used all the different options  yet but the quality of the pictures are excellent. I desperately needed a new phone and friends & family recommend a Samsung. After looking at professional reviews for the A42 I thought I'd take the leap. I'm so pleased I did it everything I want in a phone. Easy to use, does what I need and the camera is fantastic.
For the price it is a good responsive phone + 5G ready can't ask for more.

Bought this as my old phone was running out of stored memory. Did quite a bit of research prior to buying and decided on this one. The features are what you would expect from samsung. Great camera and only need to charge the battery every couple of days. Set up was quick and easy and being able to automatically transfer all contacts and Apps was a bonus. Great amount of memory also.
Got this phone to update from A30s. Lot better and just been upate to Android 11.

Love my phone easy to use chargers in 2 hours and last for 2days plus. Takes brilliant photos connected easily to my computer and does all the things I want. It is a little bit bigger than my last Samsung but I have not found that a problem fits easily in my hand and face recognition works every time.

After replacing my s10 with a A42 5g I was expecting a down grade on features, not so.
Screen resolution, sound and cameras on this phone are just as good, battery lasts a good two days for me, a high user.
Only let down is the lack of wireless charge ability. We'll worth the money.
It's a better phone overall then my a41 the features seems to be more advanced

Needed to upgrade my phone due to maxing out internal 32gb memory on essential apps. Required future proof phone, with good  memory, fast, excellent camera especially for macro work and 5g compatible. The phone ticked all the boxes, so far really pleased.

Love this phone. Lots of room for apps and storage. Only issue is the shutter speed on the camera is slow which causes you to miss the moment. Especially with children and pets that move a lot. The phone is over all good value.

Bought 4 of them.  In many ways better than my year old S20+.  It has reasonable camera (out of the box, no need for the ongoing camera updates). It has 3.5mm accessory jack, expansion card slot (that S21+ doesn't have) and relatively fast processor.  The low display resolution doesn't mean, that your photos, or video clips have low resolution.  You can always watch them in hi-res on your tablet, or laptop.  The low screen resolution equals to lower power consumption and longer battery time. The A42 5G super amoled screen in general use (games, Youtube), is no different, from hi-res screen in my S20+.  In fact after my purchase of first A42 5G, I have reduced the resolution of my other phones, to reduce the time they spend on high speed chargers.

Very happy with this phone. Good battery life, and much more storage than my old Galaxy, and I was able to quickly, and easily, transfer everything straight over from my old phone.
Takes good, sharp photos and videos.
